Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-33099 affecting package nmap for versions less than 7.95-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-33099 affecting package nmap for versions less than 7.95-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package nmap is earlier than 7.95-1, affected by CVE-2022-33099
